enhanced_by.reason: Ensures the input map is not null before converting to Properties.

enhanced_by.method_name: safeAddToMap(Map<? super K, Object>, K, Object)
enhanced_by.reason: Handles null values in the map by converting them to empty strings.
Both methods involve converting a collection to a string-based format.
Both methods involve converting a collection to a different type (Map to Properties, ResourceBundle to Map).
